title: 50/50 Raffle Ticket Seller - Pro Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: 50/50 Raffle Ticket Seller Posted/Updated: 10-15-2015 Brief Job Description: Approach fans pre-game and in-game to explain the details of the 50/50 raffle program. Accurately handle the sale and distribution of the tickets, following program requirements.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
